recipes.title: Caramel Cashew Milkshake

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Milkshake. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. You could try NV Johnson Estate Cream Sherry. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Johnson Estate Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: Very aromatic with notes of hazelnut, vanilla, and a touch of oak followed by sweet raisins and a touch of yeast. Clean lasting finish. Good now but will reward those allow it to age"". A favorite pre-prandial beverage. Consider it with nuts before dinner as an aperitif, or after dinner with dessert, especially chocolates and fruit-based desserts. Also wonderful on cold afternoons, served with biscotti to dip in ""Italian-style"". "

recipes.instructions: In a microwave safe dish, combine caramel and milk. Cook on high until milk starts to bubble, about 15 seconds. Remove and stir until caramel is melted and smooth. Set aside to cool to room temperature.Add caramel mixture and ice cream to Blender Jar. Blend until smooth. Add cashews and pulse until cashews are evenly distributed throughout the shake but not smooth.Twister Jar Directions:Add caramel mixture and ice cream to Twister Jar; push ice cream down to blade and place Twister Lid on jar. Hold Twister Lid and with the other hand press "Speed Up", turn Twister Lid counter-clockwise during blending and run until nearly smooth. Press "Pulse" to stop blender. Add cashews. Replace lid and press "Pulse" until cashews are evenly distributed throughout the shake but not smooth.

steps.step: In a microwave safe dish, combine caramel and milk. Cook on high until milk starts to bubble, about 15 seconds.
Remove and stir until caramel is melted and smooth. Set aside to cool to room temperature.
Add caramel mixture and ice cream to Blender Jar. Blend until smooth.

analyzedInstructions.name: Add cashews and pulse until cashews are evenly distributed throughout the shake but not smooth.Twister Jar Directions

steps.step: Add caramel mixture and ice cream to Twister Jar; push ice cream down to blade and place Twister Lid on jar. Hold Twister Lid and with the other hand press "Speed Up", turn Twister Lid counter-clockwise during blending and run until nearly smooth. Press "Pulse" to stop blender.
Add cashews. Replace lid and press "Pulse" until cashews are evenly distributed throughout the shake but not smooth.
